channel.title: [WIP] My first official map [WIP]
channel.description:
Basically I'm making my first map (officially) and it's basically a flatmap I generated and it's meant to be a puzzle/adventure map.
Basically I've done 2/8 of my rooms and I want some opinions on it.
Here's some pics:
[img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/6105/712a438eff4f4bd486244ec.png[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/1029/2b6474e9609842938dd10dd.png[/img] [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/8678/8457fcef4ae345f7932ab32.png[/img] [img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/5687/22582bf687b94ff18fbb1a0.png[/img] [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/2351/12d6b565b30a48438d933c8.png[/img]
Requests are accepted :P

item.title: [WIP] My first official map [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

LilXCj:

Needs more map notes + more room and less half assed decoration.

I’m already adding more rooms. My first rooms were half assed. Decorations are improving, and I’m working on a lava wall.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] My first official map [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

Tom_BETA:

So judging from the images you must jump near lava, then sprint past firing dispensers and then you’re free?

as it appears yes, but i’m not done, my 3rd challenge is by far the hardest, it’s got this lava bridge thing, where the pistons are bringing the blocks up and down, you have to find the right level to pull and if u don’t you can’t get past, cause you have to jump like 5 blocks in between or so

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] My first official map [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

looks cool so far, reminds me of SAW (the movies) i love these kinda maps. u should add hidden paths for the keen eye (like cobblestone hiding a passage in a wall of stone) and buttons that will lead u into various paths and taking the wrong path will dump u back the button room :D, make sure to send me the download for it. i’d love to help give u some interesting ideas too if you’d like

Read full topic
